dict.acceptation: （军队中的）班；（暗杀）小组；体育运动的运动（代表）队；（对付某类犯罪活动的）警察队伍；

sent.orig: Rally Points are dynamic spawn points created by the Squad Leaders for each particular squad.
sent.trans: 接力重生点是由小队长为他的小队设置的移动重生点。

sent.orig: Squad leader had been hit, but squad leader and the group secretary.
sent.trans: 一直和班长闹矛盾，但一直和团支书关系挺好。

sent.orig: I could see Plain as day it was Red from 3rd Squad.
sent.trans: 我就象白天一样看的清楚，那不是3班的“红毛”吗。

sent.orig: A squad of our troops held off six attacks of a numerically superior enemy.
sent.trans: 我们部队的一个班打退了在人数上占优势的敌人的6次进攻。

sent.orig: The 14th was first encountered by Omega Squad during their deployment to Haurgab.
sent.trans: 第14步兵旅是共和国突击队欧米伽小队在Haurgab执行任务时遇到的第一支部队。
